title: Pan-filovirus T-cell vaccine protects mice from Ebola and Marburg

title_detail.value: Pan-filovirus T-cell vaccine protects mice from Ebola and Marburg

summary: Vaccines that induce protective T-cell responses could protect against members across the filovirus family, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Vaccines that induce protective T-cell responses could protect against members across the filovirus family, according to a new study.
